summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 KEYSTONE SPRINTER.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FROM KEYSTONE ON MARCH 28, 2008.  HE SCHEDULED AN APPOINTMENT FOR THE RECALL REPAIR TO BE PERFORMED.  THE CONTACT ASKED KEYSTONE IF THEY COULD SEND A TECHNICIAN TO HIS HOME BECAUSE IT WOULD COST TOO MUCH TO PULL THE VEHICLE TO THE REPAIR SHOP.  KEYSTONE STATED THAT THEY WOULD NOT SEND ANYONE TO HIS LOCATION AND, IF HE WANTED THE FREE REPAIR, HE WOULD HAVE TO BRING THEM THE VEHICLE.  THE CONTACT DOES NOT WISH TO TRAVEL THAT FAR AND HAVE TO PAY FOR GAS.  NO OTHER VEHICLE INFORMATION WAS AVAILABLE.  THE RECALL NUMBER WAS UNKNOWN.
